snippet.title: Ruins of the Forgotten Trailer Reveal
snippet.description:
We’re beyond excited to share the first official trailer for our game, Ruins of the Forgotten (ROTF)! 🏞️

ROTF is an open-world survival game where every decision counts. Explore a world filled with danger, mystery, and untold stories. Can you survive the ruins?

🔥 Demo dropping soon on Steam!
🕹️ Catch us at Steam Next Fest for an exclusive first playthrough.

Wishlist ROTF on Steam and stay tuned for more updates! Your support means everything to us. 💖

👉 https://bit.ly/ROTFGame

#ROTF #RuinsOfTheForgotten #GameTrailer #OpenWorldSurvival #IndieGameDev #SteamNextFest #GameLaunch #2DudeStudios

Demo is out, Play the Demo on STEAM.
